summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1337, for the improvement of Fourth Avenue South, from Washington Street to Main Street, all in the City of Seattle, by paving the same with vitrified brick, laid upon a proper concrete foundation, and by constructing granite curbs, sewers, water mains and other appurtenances therein, under Ordinance No. 14983 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
